Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Vincci Gala, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, minutes from Casa Calvet and Palau de la Musica Catalana. This 4-star hotel is close to Casa Batllo and Sagrada Familia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 78 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features at this Art Deco hotel include wedding services and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Vincci Gala, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, minutes from Casa Calvet and Palau de la Musica Catalana. This 4-star hotel is close to Casa Batllo and Sagrada Familia.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Casa Calvet - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Palau de la Musica Catalana - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Tivoli Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Santa Caterina Market - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Placa de Catalunya - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Arc de Triomf - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Diocesan Museum of Barcelona - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Roman Tombs - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Barcelona Cathedral - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Frederic Mares Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Museu de la Xocolata - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Placa del Rei - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Barcelona History Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Museu del Calcat - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Picasso Museum - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Vincci Gala is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 12.6 km / 7.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Barcelona Tourist Tax applies, to be paid directly to the hotel upon check-in. Guests under the age of 16 are exempt. Tax rates apply per person, per night, for a maximum 7 nights, as follows: 5-star EUR 2.48; 4-star EUR 1.21; 1 to 3-star EUR 0.72. Applicable from 18/Jun/2015 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Room 1
Check in time: 2pm Check out time: 12pm If you plan to arrive after 8pm, please advise the hotel.
Notice
The Catalan government applies a tax regulation for hotel stays in Catalonia. The charges are per person (age 17 and over) per night (up to 7 nights stay) and are applicable by the following scheme: Catalonia: 5* hotel Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 2.48 VAT included 4* hotel Barcelona City 1.21 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Apartments – holiday homes – tourist accommodation Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Rest of accommodation types Barcelona City 0.72 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.50 VAT included. Tax is payable directly at the hotel upon arrival.

Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No date, name and room changed allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. City tax per person to be paid by the guest upon check-out.
